title: How to Make Rainbow Fruit Salad

steps.title: Prepare the fruit.
steps.content: Prepare the fruit. Make sure that all of it is washed, peeled, and sliced properly. If you find a different kind of a certain fruit, or find another kind of fruit to add, then add it. Cut a Mango Cut Strawberries for Every Occasion Cut an Orange Peel an Orange Cut a Kiwi Peel a Kiwi

steps.title: Add all the fruit to a large bowl.
steps.content: Add all the fruit to a large bowl. Make sure to mix it up.

steps.title: Combine all the ingredients for the sauce and mix.
steps.content: Combine all the ingredients for the sauce and mix.

steps.title: Pour honey orange sauce over the fruit just before serving.
steps.content: Pour honey orange sauce over the fruit just before serving.
